after: function process(user){ if (!user) return; if (!user.isActive) return; send(user); }
why_safe: Same conditions and side effects preserved; nesting reduced with guard clauses.

before: async function handle(req){ if(req){ if(req.valid){ const data = await load(req.id); return format(data); } } return null; }
after: async function handle(req){ if (!req) return null; if (!req.valid) return null; const data = await load(req.id); return format(data); }
why_safe: Return values and async await order preserved while reducing nesting.
